SELECT id id, name name, description description, DATE_FORMAT(begin_time, '%Y.%m.%d %T') beginTime, DATE_FORMAT(end_time, '%Y.%m.%d %T') endTime, status status, DATE_FORMAT(create_time, '%Y.%m.%d %T') createTime, DATE_FORMAT(update_time, '%Y.%m.%d %T') updateTime FROM project WHERE status != -1 And id= #{id} And name like #{name} And #{time}>= begin_time And #{time}<= end_time ORDER BY id LIMIT #{offSet}, #{pageRow}
SELECT count(0) FROM project u LEFT JOIN group_project ug ON ug.project = u.id LEFT JOIN `group` g ON g.id = ug.`group` WHERE u.status != -1 And g.status != -1 And ug.status != -1

SELECT u.id id, u.name name, g.name groupName, u.status status FROM project u LEFT JOIN group_project ug ON ug.project = u.id LEFT JOIN `group` g ON g.id = ug.`group` WHERE u.status != -1 And g.status != -1 And ug.status != -1 And u.id= #{id} ORDER BY u.id LIMIT #{offSet}, #{pageRow}
